## Slots

| Slot                       | Description                             |
| -------------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `"editor"`                 | Slot for the editor.                    |
| `"global-action"`          | Slot for global action.                 |
| `"inserting"`              | Slot for inserting actions.             |
| `"lists-indentation"`      | Slot for lists and indentation actions. |
